00063

00066     }
00067

00069     wicon.CopyFromBitmap(micon);

00196     wxString path = pConfig->Read(_T("DB-Path"), _T(""));    
00197    
00198     wxString Part;
00199 
00200     if(path.Len()!=0){
00201     for(int x=1; x <= path.Len(); x++){ 
00202         Part = path.GetChar(x);
00203         if(Part.CmpNoCase(_T(";"))==0){
00204                 seppos.Add(x);          
00205         }
00206     }
00207 
00208    if(seppos.GetCount()>0){    
00209            for(int x=0; x <= seppos.GetCount(); x++){
00210                 if(x == 0){
00211                         tmppath = path.Mid(0,seppos[x]);
00212                         if(tmppath.Len()!=0){
00213                                 dbs.Add(path.Mid(0,seppos[x]));
00214                         }
00215                 }else if(x == seppos.GetCount()){
00216                         tmppath = path.Mid(seppos[x-1]+1,path.Len());
00217                         if(tmppath.Len()!=0){
00218                                 dbs.Add(path.Mid(seppos[x-1]+1,path.Len()));
00219                         }
00220                 }else{
00221                         tmppath = path.Mid(seppos[x-1]+1,seppos[x]-seppos[x-1]-1);
00222                         if(tmppath.Len()!=0){
00223                                 dbs.Add(path.Mid(seppos[x-1]+1,seppos[x]-seppos[x-1]-1));
00224                         }
00225                 }
00226             }     
00227      }else{
00228         dbs.Add(path);
00229      }  
00230    }
00231 
00232     dbpath = new wxListBox(dbpanel, ID_DB_PATH, wxPoint(115, 13), wxSize(340, 120),dbs,wxLB_EXTENDED |wxLB_NEEDED_SB);
00233 
00234     wxBitmap  notelogo = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_TIP, client, wxSize(32,35));
00235 
00236     (void)new wxStaticBitmap (dbpanel, -1, notelogo, wxPoint(110, 175));

00238     wxStaticText *dbnote;

00240 
00241     if(path.Len()!=0){
00242         for(int x=0; x < dbs.GetCount(); x++){
00243                         dbpath->SetSelection(x);        
00244                 }
00245     }        
00246            
00247     wxStaticText *dbtext;

00251     dbinfo = new wxButton(dbpanel, wxID_HELP, _("DB info"), wxPoint(205,135), wxSize(80,30) );
00252     
00253     if(path.Len()==0){
00254         dbinfo->Enable(FALSE);
00255     }
00256

00258     layout->AddPage(dbpanel, _("Databases"));

00262 xFarDicSettings::~xFarDicSettings()

00267 
00269 void xFarDicSettings::OnOK(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00270 {
00271       wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
00272       if ( pConfig == NULL )
00273       return;
00274 
00275      wxString path,att;
00276      dbpath->GetSelections(dbcount);
00277      
00278       if(dbcount.GetCount()>0){         
00279                 for(int x=0; x < dbcount.GetCount(); x++){
00280                         if(path.Len()==0){att = _T(";");}
00281                         if(x+1 < dbcount.GetCount()){
00282                                 path = path + dbpath->GetString(dbcount[x]) + att;
00283                         }else{
00284                                 path = path + dbpath->GetString(dbcount[x]);
00285                         }
00286                 }
00287       }
00288 
00289      if(path.Len()==0){
00290         wxString msg;
00291         msg = _("XML DB path is empty.\nxFarDic will now work without a valid database.");
00292          wxMessageBox(msg, _("Warning"), wxOK | wxICON_WARNING, this);
00293      }
00294            
00295       pConfig->SetPath(_T("/"));
00296 
00297       // save the control's values to the config
00298       if(chk_select->GetValue()){
00299           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Auto-Select"), 1);
00300       }else{
00301           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Auto-Select"), 0);
00302       }
00303       
00304       if(chk_srchsim->GetValue()){
00305           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Auto-Srch"), 1);
00306       }else{
00307           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Auto-Srch"), 0);
00308       }
00309 
00310       if(chk_spell->GetValue()){
00311           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Spell"), 1);
00312       }else{
00313           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Spell"), 0);
00314       }
00315 
00316       if(chk_hide->GetValue()){
00317           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Hide"), 1);
00318       }else{
00319           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Hide"), 0);
00320       }
00321 
00322       if(chk_revsrch->GetValue()){
00323           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/RevSrch"), 1);
00324       }else{
00325           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/RevSrch"), 0);
00326       }
00327 
00328       if(chk_watcher->GetValue()){
00329           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Watcher"), 1);
00330       }else{
00331           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Watcher"), 0);
00332       }
00333 
00334       if(chk_scanner->GetValue()){
00335           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Scanner"), 1);
00336       }else{
00337           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Scanner"), 0);
00338       }
00339 
00340       if(chk_cache->GetValue()){
00341           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Save-Cache"), 1);
00342       }else{
00343           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Save-Cache"), 0);
00344       }
00345 
00346       if(chk_winpos->GetValue()){
00347           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Win-Pos"), 1);
00348           int x, y;
00349           GetPosition(&x, &y);
00350           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/x"), (long) x);
00351           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/y"), (long) y);
00352       }else{
00353           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Win-Pos"), 0);
00354           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/x"), 0);
00355           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/y"), 0);
00356       }
00357 
00358     pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Num-Entries"), numEntry->GetValue()); 
00359 
00360     pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Scan-Timeout"), scantimeout->GetValue()); 
00361 
00362     pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/GUI-Lang"), lang->GetSelection()); 
00363           
00364     pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/DB-Path"), path);        
00365       
00366     delete wxConfigBase::Set((wxConfigBase *) NULL);      
00367     Close(TRUE);
00368 }

00373      Close(TRUE);

00377 void xFarDicSettings::OnApply(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00378 {
00379      wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
00380      if ( pConfig == NULL )
00381         return;
00382         
00383      wxString path,att;
00384      dbpath->GetSelections(dbcount);
00385      
00386      if(dbcount.GetCount()>0){          
00387                 for(int x=0; x < dbcount.GetCount(); x++){
00388                                 if(path.Len()==0){att = _T(";");}
00389                                 if(x+1 < dbcount.GetCount()){
00390                                         path = path + dbpath->GetString(dbcount[x]) + att;
00391                                 }else{
00392                                         path = path + dbpath->GetString(dbcount[x]);
00393                                 }
00394                 }
00395       }
00396 
00397      if(path.Len()==0){
00398         wxString msg;
00399         msg = _("XML DB path is empty.\nxFarDic will now work without a valid database.");
00400          wxMessageBox(msg, _("Warning"), wxOK | wxICON_WARNING, this);
00401      }
00402       
00403       pConfig->SetPath(_T("/"));
00404 
00405   // save the control's values to the config
00406       if(chk_select->GetValue()){
00407           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Auto-Select"), 1);
00408       }else{
00409           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Auto-Select"), 0);
00410       }
00411       
00412       if(chk_srchsim->GetValue()){
00413           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Auto-Srch"), 1);
00414       }else{
00415           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Auto-Srch"), 0);
00416       }
00417 
00418       if(chk_spell->GetValue()){
00419           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Spell"), 1);
00420       }else{
00421           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Spell"), 0);
00422       }
00423 
00424       if(chk_watcher->GetValue()){
00425           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Watcher"), 1);
00426       }else{
00427           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Watcher"), 0);
00428       }
00429 
00430       if(chk_scanner->GetValue()){
00431           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Scanner"), 1);
00432       }else{
00433           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Scanner"), 0);
00434       }
00435 
00436       if(chk_hide->GetValue()){
00437           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Hide"), 1);
00438       }else{
00439           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Hide"), 0);
00440       }
00441 
00442       if(chk_revsrch->GetValue()){
00443           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/RevSrch"), 1);
00444       }else{
00445           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/RevSrch"), 0);
00446       }
00447 
00448       if(chk_cache->GetValue()){
00449           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Save-Cache"), 1);
00450       }else{
00451           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Save-Cache"), 0);
00452       }
00453 
00454       if(chk_winpos->GetValue()){
00455           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Win-Pos"), 1);
00456           int x, y;
00457           GetPosition(&x, &y);
00458           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/x"), (long) x);
00459           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/y"), (long) y);
00460       }else{
00461           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Win-Pos"), 0);
00462           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/x"), 0);
00463           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/y"), 0);
00464       }
00465 
00466       pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Num-Entries"), numEntry->GetValue());    
00467 
00468       pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Scan-Timeout"), scantimeout->GetValue()); 
00469 
00470       pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/GUI-Lang"), lang->GetSelection());            
00471               
00472       pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/DB-Path"), path);     
00473       
00474       delete wxConfigBase::Set((wxConfigBase *) NULL);
00475       m_apply->Enable(FALSE);     
00476 }
00477 
00479 void xFarDicSettings::OnSetDB(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00480 {
00481     wxString path = dbpath->GetStringSelection();
00482     exist = FALSE;
00483     
00484     if(path.Len() == 0){
00485         path = wxGetHomeDir();
00486     }
00487 
00488     wxFileDialog dialog(this, _("Choose a XML DataBase"), wxEmptyString, path, _("XML DataBase files (*.xdb)|*.xdb"),wxOPEN);        
00489 
00490     if (dialog.ShowModal() == wxID_OK)
00491     {       
00492            path = dialog.GetPath().c_str();
00493            dbpath->GetSelections(dbcount);
00494            if(dbcount.GetCount()>0){            
00495                 for(int x=0; x < dbcount.GetCount(); x++){                                              
00496                         if(path.IsSameAs(dbpath->GetString(x))){                                   
00497                                 exist = TRUE;                           
00498                         }
00499                 }
00500            }
00501         if (DB((const char *)path.mb_str(wxConvUTF8)) && exist == FALSE) {                            
00502                                                dbs.Clear();  
00503                                                dbs.Add(path);
00504                                                dbpath->InsertItems(dbs,0);
00505                                                dbpath->SetSelection(0,0);
00506                                                dbpath->SetStringSelection(path);
00507                                                dbinfo->Enable(TRUE);
00508                                                m_apply->Enable(TRUE);   
00509          }
00510     }
00511         
00512 }
00513 
00514 void xFarDicSettings::EnableApply(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00515 {
00516      m_apply->Enable(TRUE);
00517 }
00518 
00519 void xFarDicSettings::OnPathUpdate(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00520 {
00521      wxString path;
00522      m_apply->Enable(TRUE);
00523      
00524      path = dbpath->GetStringSelection();
00525    
00526      if(path.Len() > 0){        
00527           dbinfo->Enable(TRUE);
00528      }else{
00529           dbinfo->Enable(FALSE);
00530      }
00531 
00532      // DEBUGGING
00533      //fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", (const char *)path.mb_str(wxConvUTF8));
00534 }

00547 void xFarDicSettings::OnDBinfo(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00548 {
00549         wxString msg, path;
00550         
00551         dbpath->GetSelections(dbcount);
00552         msg =_T("");
00553      
00554       if(dbcount.GetCount()>0){         
00555                 for(int x=0; x < dbcount.GetCount(); x++){                                              
00556                                 path = dbpath->GetString(x);                                                                
00557                                 DB((const char *)path.mb_str(wxConvUTF8));
00558                                 if(dbname.Len()!=0 || author.Len()!=0 || version.Len()!=0 || inputlang.Len()!=0){
00559                                         msg += _("DB Name  : ")+dbname+_T("\n\n");
00560                                         msg += _("DB Author : ")+author+_T("\n\n");
00561                                         msg += _("DB Version: ")+version+_T("\n\n");
00562                                         msg += _("Input Lang: ")+inputlang+_T("\n\n\n");
00563                                 }else{
00564                                         msg = _("No information found.");
00565                                 }
00566                 }
00567       }else{
00568                 msg = _("No information found or no databse is selected.");
00569       } 
00570         wxMessageBox(msg, _("XML Database information"), wxOK | wxICON_INFORMATION, this);
00571 }
00572 
00574 bool xFarDicSettings::DB(const char *filename) {    
00575     int ret, counter;
00576    
00577     counter =0;         
00578 
00579     reader = xmlReaderForFile(filename, NULL, 0);
00580     if (reader != NULL) {
00581         ret = xmlTextReaderRead(reader);
00582         do{
00583             if(xmlTextReaderNodeType(reader) == 3)           
00584            {
00585                 counter++;            
00586                 //DEBUG
00587                 //printf("%s\n", (const char*)xmlTextReaderValue(reader));      
00588                 switch (counter)
00589                 {
00590                       case 1:
00591                           dbname = UTF8_STR((char *)xmlTextReaderValue(reader));
00592                           break;
00593                       case 2:                     
00594                           author = UTF8_STR((char *)xmlTextReaderValue(reader));
00595                           break;
00596                       case 3:
00597                           inputlang = UTF8_STR((char *)xmlTextReaderValue(reader));
00598                           break;
00599                       case 4:              
00600                           version = UTF8_STR((char *)xmlTextReaderValue(reader));       
00601                           break;
00602                   };
00603              }
00604             ret = xmlTextReaderRead(reader);                    
00605         }while (ret == 1 && counter <4);
00606          
00607         xmlFreeTextReader(reader);               
00608         xmlCleanupParser();
00609         return true;
00610     } else {
00611         wxString msg;
00612         msg.Printf( _("Parse Error. Invalid Document.\n"));
00613         wxMessageBox(msg, _T("xFarDic"), wxOK | wxICON_STOP, this);
00614         return false;
00615         fprintf(stderr, "Unable to open %s\n", filename);
00616     }
00617 }
